InstructionData.Title: Coolant Control
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias tank d0 alias analyzer d1 alias valve d2 alias outsideSensor d3
alias coolantTemp r0 alias outsideTemp r2 alias coolantTankTemp r3
define ON 1 define OFF 0
main: jal checkTemperatures bltal coolantTemp outsideTemp closeValve bgtal coolantTemp outsideTemp openValve j main
checkTemperatures: l outsideTemp outsideSensor Temperature l coolantTemp analyzer Temperature l coolantTankTemp tank Temperature j ra
closeValve: s valve On OFF j ra
openValve: s valve On ON j ra
